column1: i cant say enough good things about noctua this cooler is by far the quietest part of my build cooling a ryzen 9 5900x this keeps my cpu pretty cool too never above 80c very happy with my purchase
it was great instructions are clear cooling is excellent quality is very good
the mounting brackets noctua uses makes installation easy this is the quietest computer ive ever had and the thermals are fantastic
excellent fan cool design and top performance on a 12700k

this noctua cooler is amazing many people already know and trust the brand so it made it easy for me to justify purchasing it this is the best cooler ive found so far and i doubt i will be ditching anytime soon
very good and quiet coolerthe temps are really good too

love this cooler switched back to air cooling from aios and decided to go with this heat sink since ive fallen in love with noctuas fans this product did not disappoint at all easy install quiet quality built and packaged very impressed with temps

i watched a few reviews of this cooler on youtube and i was sure it would work with my 12th gen i9 it works just fine no throttling and no need for undervolting im very impressed with this cooler just make sure you have a case with good air flow and you will be just fine
fits in perfectly and will last for years to come

as always with noctua you get excellent quality for your money
after i had installed two 15s before this time a 12 was installed on a new cpu and i must say i am more than satisfied will use noctua products again next time

very nice fan it does not low at all and my whole set up is very silent it is amazing i am new to build a pc so it does take me a while to set it up i would recommend you guys to watch tutorial on youtube if you are a newbie on building pc like me
best cpu air cooler on the market hands down whisper quiet lowered my cpu temps by a lot and installing it was super simple couldnt recommend this product more
great cooler nice and quiet keeps the temps good as well size fits perfectly in a standard atx case
it is amazing its not noticeable to me sound wise looks great and my cpu has been very cool never reaching 72 in 1440p aaa titles
for how well this cpu cooler can keep the temperatures down its actually very impressive my i7 11700k stays cool even at full load i highly recommend this product

i love that its small and black
it has almost universal compatibility with everything including ram clearances
the mounting could not be more simple and straightforward its also very solid
it can cool my 5950x with oc without any issues at all

just outstanding
works like a charm keeps cpu temps nice and cool and was so effortlessly installed a great choice for an air cooler
the heatsink is quite quiet and offers excellent performance
honestly theres nothing i dislike about this system its amazing im running a 12th gen intel with this and its kept it cool under a long gaming sessions no problem and im talking 1014hrs no break
cant go wrong with one of the best brands in cooling looks great works great and does the job at keeping my cpu temps under control
the heatsink is excellent good size and in black it looks better
very fast delivery in the best quality

noctua nhu12a chromaxblack single tower cpu heatsink 120 mm black perfect in every respect
easy and safe mounting system incredibly low noise level and finally very aesthetically beautiful highly recommended
amazon as always impeccable top service
so far so good
rather imposing but its always a pleasure to have noctua perf level is great even if not oc the proc
noctua nhu12a very good product line easy to install cool very good no noise or vibration can store 4 bars of ram without a problem i recommend it
i have this cooling a 5900x idle at 3040 degrees max of 70 under load which i find pretty impressive

for me the best air cooler hear him barely or not at all and with a headset ehh not the performance is better than the dark rock pro 4 that i had before but have now installed it in another computer due to a cpu change great for me
excellent keeps my processor at normal operating temperatures rayzen 5800x
very good product
perfect size and keeps my processor cool
comes with everything you need and great instructions

i bought this to keep an i711700k cool under load i play 4k over 60fps the cpu is paired with a rtx3080ti and this cooler does a great job idle in the low 30s and have never seen the cpu over 60s celsius i am very happy i spent too much on the gpu and nvmes to have a liquid cooler leak for whatever reason i more than happy with this air solution
anything by noctua is a1 second to none awesome cpu cooler
replaced my fractal s 360mm aio with this on my ryzen 9 5900x this cooler beat it by around 10c while being almost silent as well i cant recommend this cooler enough
replaced my previous build aio less wires and much quieter performance is just as good and it was half the price added bonus no rgb

this fan works really well for the required footprint in your case it however is overpriced by about 20 the build quality is one of the highest though unlike most of my recent amazon purchases this one bought as new came as new so i guess that is a plus

beast of an air cooler and nearly silent rarely if ever hesr it ramp up a bit temps stay around 39c normally and gaming around 56c to 60c max im running a 5800x and this is by far the best air cooler i have ever owned
the wellknown and proven quality doesnt really require any further comment everything is great

i always choose noctua products because they are easy to install and they do what they are supposed to do also noctua provides a wealth of information on their website about all their models so i can make a informed decision on which model to use as the saying goes it takes a good engineer to make a simple machine to do a simple job

this thing can handle my 3950x5950xand12900k no problem
amazing what noctua has done
cant even think of any cons
fans come in black now
perfect for an air cooled black out build
if you need an air cooler to handle the heat look no further
good product excellent quality

the part has phenomenal cooling performance
im from a 6700k with 280 wakue
switched to a 12700k which the cooler handles loosely
super quiet top workmanship and epic cooling performance at aio level
impeccable performance inaudible operation arguably the best smaller form factor air cooler on the market
i have this fan with 5800x and it running at 35 degrees in idle very easy installation and this was my first one you cannot go wrong with noctua
from what ive heard the 12 gen cpus run really hot and this has no problem cooling my cpu 3340c idle and while gaming 5067c so if youre thinking about buying this i would

works amazing keeps temps under control i was running idol at 40 to 45 and when gaming 89 to 99 on my old cooler but after installing this cooler now my pc is running 30 to 33 idol and 50 to 56 wail gaming instalation is easy and great instruction would recommend

i bought it with ryzen 5900x and i love it
 room temp 81c cpu idle 39c cpu prime95 full load 65c
 cpu pwm fan speed setting 50 minimum 100 at 80c chassis corsair 4000d airflow 2x140mm intake 1x120mm exhaust amd ryzen 9 5900x asus strix x570e wifi ii motherboard ai overclock
noise level cooling performance absoloutly perfect

ive always had stock heatsinks on the intel i7 9700 where gaming temperatures on warzone even reached 98 degrees today after mounting it and after playing for 2 hours i experienced peaks of 80 degrees with an average of 65 degrees plus the fans are super quiet super satisfied

after doing some research and trying to find a cooler that is not a aio this fits the bill perfectly it is quiet easy to install and comes with everything you need in the box for a lga 1700 and you do not need to worry about reaching out the the manufacture for parts

this is all round great cooler and will be buy another one for my second pc

instructions were clear and concise all black is great mounting is goodwould like a preset torque driver included in the kit for the price keeps a 11700kstock 10c under tjmax when running prime95s hardest test cold plate is machined to an even and flat surface all in all this is a good upgrade from coolermaster 212 series
core i7 2500k 42ghz gets up to about 70°c under synthetic load works amazing
the assembly was a bit tricky but its also due to the base otherwise everything was perfect good cooling performance not too loud i can only recommend it
performs great looks great will only let you down if you are trying to cool intels 250w monsters
i purchased this after my water cooler failed it was easy to install and cools just as good as the water cooler did and will be much more reliable

removed my corsair h100i aio liquid cooler in favour of this system on my 5600x the temperatures under load were tyically in the 60s to early 70s matching if not beating my previous system well done to noctua for this going to keep it for years and years to come only issue is that its quite pricey

if youre looking for a high end cooler that stays pretty quiet and keeps temps down this is it better than the 212 black edition but also double the price if you want a high end build to cool down high end components splurge and get this mounting is an absolute breeze
noctua products are well built their fans are quiet will buy from them again

amazing cooling even on intels hottest processor the12900ks it does a good job under full cpu load noise level is silent except when cpu cores are all going under heavy load then you can hear it faintly i have never had one lock up on the system while running this heat sync

works great much easier to install than other tower air coolers ive used just follow the included directions and dont put too much thermal paste and youre set postal service lost my package and it took me an extra week to get this but not amazons fault so no stars taken off

again a quality premium product from noctua i can barely hear the fans really easy to install instructions were quiet easy to follow and also lots of youtube videos around i would have preferred this cooler to be £10 cheaper as in the same price bracket as the chrome and brownbeige version guess you pay a premium for chromax

the noise level is quite low and the cooling performance you get out of this cpu cooler is fantastic my one gripe with the product is that its a pain in the butt to screw the heatsink to the motherboard after mounting it however once that process is finished then the then the rest of the installation is simple

see title otherwise it remains to be said that noctua has finally fulfilled my wish for perfect cooling and optical neutrality with the black edition the noctua style fan holder looks strange at first but is efficient and holds

this air cooler keeps my cpu cooler than muly old water cooling system did and its much quieter always trust noctua and thankfully the colors are all black so no more hideous brown and tan fans buy this cooler
this cooler works as well as most aios quiet and cools well
cooling an intel i712700k works very well under load

read through the simple directions in accordance with your motherboard works great for my i7 and probably would use it on an i9

update been running i912900k at 80 percent load 67 c and holding given though that i have a full tower 3 140 and 4 120 pulling air in and one 140 pushing out

does what its supposed to do
installation was childs play
even for a computer genius like me the installation was possible without any problems
the temperature is now as low as never before almost inaudible
great part
i would buy it again at any time
we buy consistent when we want a quality and reliable product the placement on the new socket 1700 from intel it went without problems definitely recommend
it fits perfectly designed to get the most you possibly can with a standard size build runs my 10700k between 50c and 69c with a 34percent overclock from stock settings

after years of liquid refrigeration i decided to switch to air i read several reviews where they put the u12a better than the d15 even with cpus like the 12900k like mine the result is that by limiting the cpu to 192w it yields 95 as full the heatsink manages to keep it at 85 degrees with almost no noise highly recommended
really powerful cooler accidentally received the beige and chrome one but amazon quickly replaced it with the correct one
fan is quiet and very effective it is keeping my ryzen 7 5800 at 37 celsius at 47 ghz

admittedly im a noctua fan no pun intended installed easy on new z690 build intel 12600k running mid 20s at idle in a cm h500 case kinda liked the the brown beige as a statement thing but went black 2 things you should never go cheap on is power and cooling you wont be sorry

with the new fan in my gaming pc i have
brought the cpu temperature from 85 degrees to 51 degrees celsius i also have better circulation around the case and the gpu temperature has also dropped

cools my 13700k great even in an sff case its a little pricy but if you dont have the space for a larger cooler this is the cooler you want

i just ran a 40 min aida64 cpu test and this cooler handled the power hungry 13700k with zero thermal throttle

great job noctua
play video mounted on a 10700k it has better thermals thank my previous 240mm aio
not as good as a aio liquid cooler but definitely gets the job done and to me it looks 10x better that a aio but thats my opinion but it definitely keeps my temps in check
i use this cooler with an i7 12700k and it keeps it cool and quiet even when under 100 load my cpu stays at around 60c

its pretty big but cools very well when gambling i usually had 8590 degrees now usually only 75 degrees on average does what it should assembly is easy you just have to move the mainboard or remove it if in doubt because it is so big

custom openair intel core i5 build the smallest noctua couldnt quite pull it off so i exchanged for this unit soak test kept me under 65c at less than 1000 rpm so i have an effective cooling solution thats really quiet nice
low noise level easy to install
top product from 7880 celsius to 5860 cooled my ryzen 7

i7 12900k is brought to 31 degrees idle with the correct fan settings approx 85 constant under load
by refining the settings and possibly improving the airflow housing you can certainly lower the temperature by 12 degrees
absolutely recommended
if your in the market for a reliable cpu culler then noctua is the way to go

since im not a fan of aios and water cooling i installed this fan for my i512600k and im thrilled tried it out and you wont need any more aios

easy installation almost silently and reduces temperatures mercilessly which is the most important thing
noctua nhu12a is near aio performance expensive but well worth it
good alternative to my aio whose pump failed me after 3 years and no worries about upgrading the coolant with air coolants it is very easy to install in an already assembled configuration

looks absolutely gargantuan on tiny itx motherboard depending on io panel configuration you may need to slide fan up a click or two despite performance noise levels are low and pleasant

runs the 5900x cool without breaking a sweat even under benchmarking idle under 40c under load can hit 70c with aggressive oc settings otherwise in low 60s
runs silent keeps i7 12700 under 60c while gaming demanding titles a tad expensive but well worth it cant see myself ever needing another air cooler for future builds
its expensive but it seems to be worth it dropped my cpu temps on a ryzen9 5900x by 10c

my cpu temperature was above 90c degrees for a while that i realized the water cooler pump stopped working then i bought this air cooler and it solved the heating problem and even cooler than the water cooler very satisfied with the results highly recommended

play video
its very easy to assemble even someone without experience in assembling this type of cooler could do it maybe the noise level is a little higher than expected and the temperatures dont drop too low either thats if it doesnt get too high or in demanding tasks with a ryzen 7 3700x the maximum temperature has been 67 degrees celsius

my first cooler is still running in my old system

what can you say top cooler as you are used to from noctua
whish therell be v2 sometime in the future

can keep high end chips cool with decently quite operate where this cooler really shines is when it is paired with lower end chips like a ryzen 3600 or i5 11400f with these chips the cooler operates at 300800 rpm which is absolutely silent and temps rarely climb higher the 50 degrees
sophisticated heat sink will keep my new i712700k cool

quiet effective and not a bad price

also slightly smaller then the other noctua cpu coolers so the ram slots arent as restricted
replaced a corsaire h100 v2 that was idleing at 80cthis puppy sits at 38c it saved my system

tutto perfetto dal box alle spiegazioni
prezzo ok
this heatsink is enough for an i7 12700k prefer fans that are more reliable and quieter than aios that fail very quickly

bought this cooler as it was the only one that supported lga 1700 out of the box it keeps my 12600k in the high 60s under load
cannot fault the performance but the price is rather steep i guess you get what you pay for
i have an i712700kf with bios ai auto overclock turned on under heavy load with games like battlefield 2042 browser on with video playing its at max 66 temp ive never seen it go higher

initially i was disspointed because this appeared to not work better for me compared to a noctua nhu12s with one extra nff12 fan added for pushpull configuration in time however i got to appreciate this cooler and what a good job it does keeping my i910900k super cool in all situations compact does not block any ram slots and super quiet
this will keep your cpu cool if you keep it at idol it is very tall so if you dont have adequate spacing atx or larger case than you wont be able to fit this

i recently purchased an nr200 case and using the wraith cooler felt my cpu temps were not sufficient look up reviews and decided to bite the bullet with this tower cooler temps dropped more then 10 degrees and it is very quiet on lightmedium loads definitely paid a premium for black but i am extremely pleased with this cooler
this out preforms my nzxt kraken really quiet and no water inside my computer
cools as should i5 12600k when browsing the internet at office work inaudible

following a disappointment with an aio water cooling that only worked a few months before dying i wanted a more sustainable solution and the heat pipe system is the solution but also needs at least equivalent cooling well the nh u12a cooler gives both solutions and even offers the luxury of cooling my proc i7 11700k better than the aio 240mm msi
loud ineffective as simple as that get the nhd15 if it fits your case huge difference

and is dead silent too i was immediately convinced and ordered replacement fans and coolers for all my rigs noctua wins on further review dead silent may be subjective to how sensitive your ears and body are to super high frequency whinedrone
as title there is not enough room for 2 memory sticks on the motherboard if you want to keep both the fans on u12s might be a better option
everything is good but the fans didnt match my build and no options to buy one from noctua
does what its supposed to do cpu temperature under moderate load below 40 °c high load not yet tested
advertised as fitting z690 board but had to mount it sideways to fit my dominator ram sticks
i have this paired with a 5800x and it decreased my temps by 30 degrees from the wraith prism cooler
just a little expensive
top keeps what it promises and barely audible

replaced my aging aio and brought my idle temps from 149f to about 90 whisper quiet cant even hear it from outside the case had to offset one of the fans to clear the ram and will have to remove the cooler if i want to install more ram b550 pro4
my 5950x never goes above 65c under sustained full load ive never owned a cooler that could do that
brittle connection to the connector wiring appeared stiff from old age
my i712700k wont go over 75c stock

well price much too expensive it keeps my r7 5800x 10 degrees cooler than my simple bequiet cooler for 30€

it goes back sorry

this cooler does not fit in the lian li 011 dynamic mid tower atx case

the heat pipes hit the glass side pannel and so it does not close
i cannot explain how disappointing this was as it was completely unusable and fit within the official specs on the noctua and lian li websites
the only thing i do not like about it is the lack of installing information you have to pull on the tabs much harder than you would think to mount the fans but it may be user error
